content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must admit, I'm not one to mince words, so let's get straight to it. I'm looking for the highest possible rent for this apartment. It's a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities. I'm sure you can appreciate the value of such a location. What's your opening offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my focus is on seeking the lowest possible price due to my financial situation as a student. However, I understand the value of the location and appreciate the apartment's features.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand, Farhad Abbasi. As a landlord, I always strive for the highest possible price. Given your financial situation as a student, I don't think we will be able to find a common ground. I wish you the best of luck in your search for a more affordable apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
